ModMetaData.name: Pirated Hair From Another Mods
ModMetaData.author: REБAL
ModMetaData.description: In every pack there are only a few interesting styles, (unlike my Absolute Legends Hair mod). Carefully selected only the most interesting stuff put together by Яебал, and all the unnecessary stuff deleted/disabled in Defs. Packs that got my attention: Odz Spoons Rimsenal O21 Klimhazzard ChickenMitchell Galactic Erins Redux Accesory Persona5 ... [singing in red haired french language]: *uck them all! atutu atutu atutu...
